body_html: cc: @josh11b -- do you think there should be language-agnostic API for checkpoint readers/file readers? Right now record_reader seems to be Python-only -- https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/2b374f7d4ba578764e2b2e9f21da9ba52811a103/tensorflow/python/lib/io
